typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterProcessNumber as string ('1')
}
source(output(
		CIDNUM as decimal(38,18),
		CREATED as timestamp,
		SOURCE as string,
		UPDATED as timestamp,
		STATUS as string,
		SYNCHED as timestamp,
		PREFNAM as decimal(38,18),
		PREFPHN as decimal(38,18),
		PREFADR as decimal(38,18),
		SENDNEWS as string,
		SENDADV as string,
		SENDCAT as string,
		PREFEML as decimal(38,18),
		SENDPMAIL as string,
		NOEMAIL as string,
		ROOMPLAN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CustomerStagingtbcid
source(output(
		CIDNUM as decimal(38,18),
		SEQNUM as decimal(38,18),
		CREATED as timestamp,
		UPDATED as timestamp,
		STATUS as string,
		ADDRESS1 as string,
		ADDRESS2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIPCODE as decimal(38,18),
		ZIPCODE4 as decimal(38,18),
		VALDATE as timestamp,
		VALTYPE as string,
		VALSOURCE as decimal(38,18),
		LATITUDE as decimal(38,18),
		LONGITUDE as decimal(38,18),
		GEOTYPE as string,
		GACCURACY as decimal(38,18),
		ADROVERRSN as string,
		ADROVERDTE as timestamp,
		GORGSRC as decimal(38,18),
		GORGCRTD as timestamp,
		GORGACCUR as decimal(38,18),
		GMAPPED as string,
		GMAPTYPE as string,
		GMAPUPDT as timestamp,
		GMAPUSER as string,
		GLMAPTYPE as string,
		GLMAPUPDT as timestamp,
		GLMAPUSER as string,
		GLVERIFIED as string,
		GCONFLEVEL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CustomerStagingtbcidadr
source(output(
		CIDNUM as decimal(38,18),
		SEQNUM as decimal(38,18),
		CREATED as timestamp,
		UPDATED as timestamp,
		STATUS as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		VALDATE as timestamp,
		VALTYPE as string,
		VALSOURCE as decimal(38,18),
		EMLSOURCE as decimal(38,18),
		QCKCONEML as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CustomerStagingtbcideml
source(output(
		CIDNUM as decimal(38,18),
		SEQNUM as decimal(38,18),
		CREATED as timestamp,
		UPDATED as timestamp,
		STATUS as string,
		FIRST as string,
		LAST as string,
		MI as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CustomerStagingtbcidnam
source(output(
		CIDNUM as decimal(38,18),
		SEQNUM as decimal(38,18),
		CREATED as timestamp,
		UPDATED as timestamp,
		STATUS as string,
		TYPE as string,
		PHONE as decimal(38,18),
		EXTENSION as decimal(38,18),
		QCKCONTXT as string,
		TXTMSGCAR as decimal(38,18),
		QCKCONIVR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CustomerStagingtbcidphn
source(output(
		CIDNUM as decimal(38,18),
		SEQNUM as decimal(38,18),
		CREATED as timestamp,
		UPDATED as timestamp,
		STATUS as string,
		BILNAMSEQ as decimal(38,18),
		BILADRSEQ as decimal(38,18),
		DLVNAMSEQ as decimal(38,18),
		DLVADRSEQ as decimal(38,18)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CustomerStagingtbcidprf
source(output(
		Customer_sk as integer,
		Customer_Sequence_nk as integer,
		Customer_ID_nk as integer,
		Sequence_Status as string,
		Bill_First_Name as string,
		Bill_Last_Name as string,
		Bill_Name_Status as string,
		Bill_Address as string,
		Bill_City as string,
		Bill_State as string,
		Bill_ZIP as string,
		Bill_ZIP4 as string,
		Bill_Latitude as string,
		Bill_Longitude as string,
		Bill_Address_Status as string,
		Delivery_First_Name as string,
		Delivery_Last_Name as string,
		Delivery_Name_Status as string,
		Delivery_Address as string,
		Delivery_City as string,
		Delivery_State as string,
		Delivery_ZIP as string,
		Delivery_ZIP4 as string,
		Delivery_Latitude as string,
		Delivery_Longitude as string,
		Delivery_Address_Status as string,
		Customer_Profile_Created_Date as date,
		Customer_First_Name as string,
		Customer_Last_Name as string,
		Customer_Name_Status as string,
		Customer_Address as string,
		Customer_City as string,
		Customer_State as string,
		Customer_ZIP as string,
		Customer_ZIP4 as string,
		Customer_Latitude as string,
		Customer_Longitude as string,
		Customer_Phone_Type as string,
		Customer_Phone as string,
		Customer_Phone_Extension as string,
		Customer_Phone_Status as string,
		Customer_Email as string,
		Customer_Email_Status as string,
		Customer_Created_Date as date,
		Customer_Status as string,
		No_Email as string,
		Room_Plan as string,
		Send_Advertising as string,
		Send_Catalog as string,
		Send_News as string,
		Send_P_Mail as string,
		First_Purchase_Date as date,
		HashKey as string,
		SourceSystem_fk as integer,
		ETLBatchID_Insert as integer,
		ETLBatchID_Update as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sqlDimCustomer
BillAddress, CustomerStagingtbcidadrTypeCast join({Customer Sequence} == SEQNUM
	&& {Customer ID} == CIDNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerAdr
CustomerAddress, CustomerStagingtbcidemlTypeCast join({Customer Sequence} == SEQNUM
	&& {Customer ID} == CIDNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerEml
CustomerEmail, CustomerStagingtbcidnamTypeCast join({Customer ID} == CIDNUM
	&& {Customer Sequence} == SEQNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerNam
BillName, CustomerStagingtbcidphnString join({Customer ID} == CIDNUM
	&& {Customer Sequence} == SEQNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerPhn
tbcid, CustomerStagingtbcidprfTypeCast join({Customer Id} == CIDNUM,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerPrf
CustomerStagingtbcidTypeCast select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date} = CREATED,
		{Customer Status} = STATUS,
		{Send News} = SENDNEWS,
		{Send Advertising} = SENDADV,
		{Send Catalog} = SENDCAT,
		{Send P Mail} = SENDPMAIL,
		{No Email} = NOEMAIL,
		{Room Plan} = ROOMPLAN,
		{Customer Id} = CIDNUM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> tbcid
CustomerPrf select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence} = BILADRSEQ,
		{Delivery Name Sequence} = DLVNAMSEQ,
		{Delivery Address Sequence} = DLVADRSEQ,
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence} = BILNAMSEQ,
		{Customer Sequence} = SEQNUM,
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID} = {Customer Id},
		{Sequence Status} = STATUS,
		{Customer Profile Created Date} = CREATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerProfile
DeliveryAddress, CustomerStagingtbcidadrTypeCast join({Bill Address Sequence} == SEQNUM
	&& {Customer ID} == CIDNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> BillAdr
CustomerProfile, CustomerStagingtbcidadrTypeCast join({Delivery Address Sequence} == SEQNUM
	&& {Customer ID} == CIDNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> DeliveryAdr
DeliveryAdr select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Delivery ADDRESS} = ADDRESS1,
		{Delivery CITY} = CITY,
		{Delivery STATE} = STATE,
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE} = ZIPCODE,
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4} = ZIPCODE4,
		{Delivery LATITUDE} = LATITUDE,
		{Delivery LONGITUDE} = LONGITUDE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DeliveryAddress
BillAdr select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS},
		{Delivery ADDRESS},
		{Delivery CITY},
		{Delivery STATE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},
		{Delivery LATITUDE},
		{Delivery LONGITUDE},
		{Bill Address STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Bill ADDRESS} = ADDRESS1,
		{Bill CITY} = CITY,
		{Bill STATE} = STATE,
		{Bill ZIPCODE} = ZIPCODE,
		{Bill ZIPCODE4} = ZIPCODE4,
		{Bill LATITUDE} = LATITUDE,
		{Bill LONGITUDE} = LONGITUDE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> BillAddress
CustomerAdr select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Sequence Status} = {Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Delivery ADDRESS} = ADDRESS1,
		{Delivery CITY} = CITY,
		{Delivery STATE} = STATE,
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE} = ZIPCODE,
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4} = ZIPCODE4,
		{Delivery LATITUDE} = LATITUDE,
		{Delivery LONGITUDE} = LONGITUDE,
		{Bill Address STATUS},
		{Bill ADDRESS},
		{Bill CITY},
		{Bill STATE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE4},
		{Bill LATITUDE},
		{Bill LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Address STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Customer ADDRESS} = ADDRESS1,
		{Customer CITY} = CITY,
		{Customer STATE} = STATE,
		{Customer ZIPCODE} = ZIPCODE,
		{Customer ZIPCODE4} = ZIPCODE4,
		{Customer LATITUDE} = LATITUDE,
		{Customer LONGITUDE} = LONGITUDE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerAddress
CustomerEml select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS},
		{Delivery ADDRESS},
		{Delivery CITY},
		{Delivery STATE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},
		{Delivery LATITUDE},
		{Delivery LONGITUDE},
		{Bill Address STATUS},
		{Bill ADDRESS},
		{Bill CITY},
		{Bill STATE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE4},
		{Bill LATITUDE},
		{Bill LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Address STATUS},
		{Customer ADDRESS},
		{Customer CITY},
		{Customer STATE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE4},
		{Customer LATITUDE},
		{Customer LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Email STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Customer EMAIL} = EMAIL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerEmail
CustomerNam select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS},
		{Delivery ADDRESS},
		{Delivery CITY},
		{Delivery STATE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},
		{Delivery LATITUDE},
		{Delivery LONGITUDE},
		{Bill Address STATUS},
		{Bill ADDRESS},
		{Bill CITY},
		{Bill STATE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE4},
		{Bill LATITUDE},
		{Bill LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Address STATUS},
		{Customer ADDRESS},
		{Customer CITY},
		{Customer STATE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE4},
		{Customer LATITUDE},
		{Customer LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Email STATUS},
		{Customer EMAIL},
		{Customer Name STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Customer FIRST} = FIRST,
		{Customer LAST} = LAST
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerName
CustomerName, CustomerStagingtbcidnamTypeCast join({Customer ID} == CIDNUM
	&& {Delivery Name Sequence} == SEQNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> DeliveryNam
DeliveryNam select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS},
		{Delivery ADDRESS},
		{Delivery CITY},
		{Delivery STATE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},
		{Delivery LATITUDE},
		{Delivery LONGITUDE},
		{Bill Address STATUS},
		{Bill ADDRESS},
		{Bill CITY},
		{Bill STATE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE4},
		{Bill LATITUDE},
		{Bill LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Address STATUS},
		{Customer ADDRESS},
		{Customer CITY},
		{Customer STATE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE4},
		{Customer LATITUDE},
		{Customer LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Email STATUS},
		{Customer EMAIL},
		{Customer Name STATUS},
		{Customer FIRST},
		{Customer LAST},
		{Delivery Name STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Delivery FIRST} = FIRST,
		{Delivery LAST} = LAST
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DeliveryName
DeliveryName, CustomerStagingtbcidnamTypeCast join({Customer ID} == CIDNUM
	&& {Bill Name Sequence} == SEQNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> BillNam
BillNam select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS},
		{Delivery ADDRESS},
		{Delivery CITY},
		{Delivery STATE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},
		{Delivery LATITUDE},
		{Delivery LONGITUDE},
		{Bill Address STATUS},
		{Bill ADDRESS},
		{Bill CITY},
		{Bill STATE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE4},
		{Bill LATITUDE},
		{Bill LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Address STATUS},
		{Customer ADDRESS},
		{Customer CITY},
		{Customer STATE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE4},
		{Customer LATITUDE},
		{Customer LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Email STATUS},
		{Customer EMAIL},
		{Customer Name STATUS},
		{Customer FIRST},
		{Customer LAST},
		{Delivery Name STATUS},
		{Delivery FIRST},
		{Delivery LAST},
		{Bill Name STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Bill FIRST} = FIRST,
		{Bill LAST} = LAST
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> BillName
CustomerPhn select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS},
		{Delivery ADDRESS},
		{Delivery CITY},
		{Delivery STATE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},
		{Delivery LATITUDE},
		{Delivery LONGITUDE},
		{Bill Address STATUS},
		{Bill ADDRESS},
		{Bill CITY},
		{Bill STATE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE4},
		{Bill LATITUDE},
		{Bill LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Address STATUS},
		{Customer ADDRESS},
		{Customer CITY},
		{Customer STATE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE},
		{Customer ZIPCODE4},
		{Customer LATITUDE},
		{Customer LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Email STATUS},
		{Customer EMAIL},
		{Customer Name STATUS},
		{Customer FIRST},
		{Customer LAST},
		{Delivery Name STATUS},
		{Delivery FIRST},
		{Delivery LAST},
		{Bill Name STATUS},
		{Bill FIRST},
		{Bill LAST},
		{Customer Phone STATUS} = STATUS,
		{Customer Phone TYPE} = TYPE,
		{Customer PHONE} = PHONE,
		{Customer Phone EXTENSION} = EXTENSION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerPhone
CustomerStage derive(CustomerHash = sha1(toString({Customer Created Date}),{Customer Status},{Send News},toString({Bill Address Sequence}),toString({Delivery Name Sequence}),toString({Delivery Address Sequence}),{Send Advertising},{Send Catalog},{Send P Mail},{No Email},toString({Bill Name Sequence}),toString({Customer Sequence}),{Room Plan},toString({Customer ID}),{Customer Sequence Status},toString({Customer Profile Created Date}),{Delivery Address STATUS},{Delivery ADDRESS},{Delivery CITY},{Delivery STATE},{Delivery  ZIPCODE},{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},{Delivery LATITUDE},{Delivery LONGITUDE},{Bill Address STATUS},{Bill ADDRESS},{Bill CITY},{Bill STATE},{Bill ZIPCODE},{Bill ZIPCODE4},{Bill LATITUDE},{Bill LONGITUDE},{Customer Address STATUS},{Customer ADDRESS},{Customer CITY},{Customer STATE},{Customer ZIPCODE},{Customer ZIPCODE4},{Customer LATITUDE},{Customer LONGITUDE},{Customer Email STATUS},{Customer EMAIL},{Customer Name STATUS},{Customer FIRST},{Customer LAST},{Delivery Name STATUS},{Delivery FIRST},{Delivery LAST},{Bill Name STATUS},{Bill FIRST},{Bill LAST},{Customer Phone STATUS},{Customer Phone TYPE},{Customer PHONE},{Customer Phone EXTENSION})) ~> CustomerHash
CustomerHash, sqlDimCustomer lookup({Customer ID} == Customer_ID_nk
	&& {Customer Sequence} == Customer_Sequence_nk,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupCustomer
CustomerPhone derive(each(match(type=='string'), $$ = iifNull(trim($$),'')),
		each(match(type=='timestamp'), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$)))) ~> PreStageCustomer
CustomerStagingtbcidadr derive(ZIPCODE = toString(toInteger(ZIPCODE)),
		ZIPCODE4 = toString(toInteger(ZIPCODE4)),
		LATITUDE = toString(LATITUDE),
		LONGITUDE = toString(LONGITUDE),
		CIDNUM = toInteger(CIDNUM),
		SEQNUM = toInteger(SEQNUM)) ~> CustomerStagingtbcidadrTypeCast
CustomerStagingtbcidphn derive(PHONE = toString(toInteger(PHONE)),
		EXTENSION = toString(toInteger(EXTENSION))) ~> CustomerStagingtbcidphnString
CustomerStagingtbcid derive(CIDNUM = toInteger(CIDNUM),
		PREFNAM = toInteger(PREFNAM),
		PREFPHN = toInteger(PREFPHN),
		PREFADR = toInteger(PREFADR),
		PREFEML = toInteger(PREFEML)) ~> CustomerStagingtbcidTypeCast
CustomerStagingtbcideml derive(CIDNUM = toInteger(CIDNUM),
		SEQNUM = toInteger(SEQNUM)) ~> CustomerStagingtbcidemlTypeCast
CustomerStagingtbcidnam derive(CIDNUM = toInteger(CIDNUM),
		SEQNUM = toInteger(SEQNUM)) ~> CustomerStagingtbcidnamTypeCast
CustomerStagingtbcidprf derive(CIDNUM = toInteger(CIDNUM),
		SEQNUM = toInteger(SEQNUM),
		BILNAMSEQ = toInteger(BILNAMSEQ),
		BILADRSEQ = toInteger(BILADRSEQ),
		DLVNAMSEQ = toInteger(DLVNAMSEQ),
		DLVADRSEQ = toInteger(DLVADRSEQ)) ~> CustomerStagingtbcidprfTypeCast
PreStageCustomer derive(each(match(instr(upper(name),'LATITUDE')+instr(upper(name),'LONGITUDE')+instr(upper(name),'ZIP')>0), $$ = trim(rpad($$,20,' '),' '))) ~> CustomerStage
FilterDuplicates split(isNull(Customer_ID_nk),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitCustomerNK@(insertcustomer, updatecustomer)
ConditionalSplitCustomerNK@updatecustomer split(HashKey==CustomerHash,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitHashMatch@(matchinghash, nonmatchinghash)
ConditionalSplitHashMatch@nonmatchinghash alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> updatedimcustomer
LookupCustomer select(mapColumn(
		{Customer Created Date},
		{Customer Status},
		{Send News},
		{Bill Address Sequence},
		{Delivery Name Sequence},
		{Delivery Address Sequence},
		{Send Advertising},
		{Send Catalog},
		{Send P Mail},
		{No Email},
		{Bill Name Sequence},
		{Customer Sequence},
		{Room Plan},
		{Customer ID},
		{Customer Sequence Status},
		{Customer Profile Created Date},
		{Delivery Address STATUS},
		{Delivery ADDRESS},
		{Delivery CITY},
		{Delivery STATE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE},
		{Delivery  ZIPCODE4},
		{Delivery LATITUDE},
		{Delivery LONGITUDE},
		{Bill Address STATUS},
		{Bill ADDRESS},
		{Bill CITY},
		{Bill STATE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE},
		{Bill ZIPCODE4},
		{Bill LATITUDE},
		{Bill LONGITUDE},
		{Customer Address STATUS},
		{Customer ADDRESS},
		{Customer CITY},
		{Customer STATE},
